code: @Manual{,   title = {mint: Text Mining Theses},   author = {Claudiu Forgaci},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://ud3-lab.github.io/mint/}, }

title: Text Mining Theses
text: Theses relatively structured documents often publicly available thus potentially useful text mining applications. ‘mint’ package provides text mining workflow tailored expected format structure theses. workflow covers extraction, pre-processing, analysis, visualisation reporting.

title: Text Mining Theses
